label: LYM-S1/JUN
description: Lymphatic temperament - Spring season. Characterized by coolness and moisture, associated with increased lymphatic activity.

label: SANG-A3/DEC
description: Sanguine temperament - Autumn/December. Warm and moist nature, associated with blood dominance and cheerful disposition.

label: BIL-S5/SUM
description: Bilious temperament - Summer season. Hot and dry nature, associated with yellow bile dominance and active metabolism.

label: NER-F1/WIN
description: Nervous temperament - Winter season. Cold and dry nature, associated with black bile dominance and melancholic tendencies.
